title: The Villainess Wants to Marry a Commoner!! (WN) - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Age Progression   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Beasts   Beautiful Female Lead   Cheats   Childhood Love   Cute Children   Cute Protagonist   Depictions of Cruelty   Different Social Status   Doting Parents   Dwarfs   Early Romance   Elves   Engagement   Female Protagonist   First Love   Game Elements   Kind Love Interests   Lack of Common Sense   Love at First Sight   Magic   Magical Space   Magical Technology   Male Yandere   Multiple POV   Multiple Timelines   Nobles   Otome Game   Overpowered Protagonist   Past Plays a Big Role   Previous Life Talent   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-15   Reincarnated in a Game World   Strong Love Interests   Sword And Magic   Time Loop   Time Skip   Villainess Noble Girls   Zombies
author: Anzutei Riko   杏亭リコ
description: After reincarnating, I found myself as the Villainess in an Otome game I often played. A prince, a knight, a magician…to these high-spec love interests I say ‘no thank you’! I’ll beat down all the destruction flags in my way with all my might to get happily married with my beloved character, the “Commoner”!>
